de:
Medieval village listed as a Monument Historique. Floral village approved as a "village with personality" (museum, wine cellar, traditional crafts workshops). 
Don't miss the medieval day in mid-August.
ru:
Medieval village listed as a Monument Historique. Floral village approved as a "village with personality" (museum, wine cellar, traditional crafts workshops). 
Don't miss the medieval day in mid-August.
en:
Medieval village listed as a Monument Historique. Floral village approved as a "village with personality" (museum, wine cellar, traditional crafts workshops). 
Don't miss the medieval day in mid-August.
it:
Medieval village listed as a Monument Historique. Floral village approved as a "village with personality" (museum, wine cellar, traditional crafts workshops). 
Don't miss the medieval day in mid-August.
fr:
Village médiéval inscrit à l'inventaire des monuments historiques. Village fleuri, classé "village de caractères" (Musée, Caveau, Ateliers de métiers anciens). 
Ne manquez pas la fête médiéval à la mi-août.
nl:
Middeleeuws dorpje genoteerd als Monument Historiek. Bloemd dorp goedgekeurd als "dorp met persoonlijkheid" (museum, wijnkelder, traditionele ambachtswerkplaatsen). 
Mis de middeleeuwse dag half augustus niet.
zh:
Medieval village listed as a Monument Historique. Floral village approved as a "village with personality" (museum, wine cellar, traditional crafts workshops). 
Don't miss the medieval day in mid-August.
es:
Medieval village listed as a Monument Historique. Floral village approved as a "village with personality" (museum, wine cellar, traditional crafts workshops). 
Don't miss the medieval day in mid-August.

nl: Dienst voor toerisme "Pays de Lamastre" - Afdeling Désaignes

de: Unser Büro ist derzeit geschlossen. Sie können sich im Büro in Lamastre informieren, das 7 km entfernt liegt und dienstags bis samstags von 10:00 bis 12:30 Uhr und von 14:00 bis 17:00 Uhr geöffnet ist, außer an Feiertagen.
en: Our office is currently closed. You can ask for information at the Lamastre office located 7km away which is open from Tuesday to Saturday from 10am to 12.30pm and from 2pm to 5pm except on public holidays.
it: Il nostro ufficio è attualmente chiuso. È possibile chiedere informazioni all'ufficio di Lamastre, situato a 7 km di distanza, aperto dal martedì al sabato dalle 10 alle 12.30 e dalle 14 alle 17, tranne nei giorni festivi.
fr: Notre bureau est actuellement fermé. Vous pouvez vous renseigner au bureau de Lamastre situé à 7km et qui est ouvert du mardi au samedi de 10h à 12h30 et de 14h à 17h sauf jours fériés.
nl: Ons kantoor is momenteel gesloten. U kunt informatie vragen bij het kantoor van Lamastre op 7 km afstand, dat geopend is van dinsdag tot zaterdag van 10.00 tot 12.30 uur en van 14.00 tot 17.00 uur, behalve op feestdagen.
es: Nuestra oficina está actualmente cerrada. Puede solicitar información en la oficina de Lamastre, situada a 7 km, que abre de martes a sábado de 10 a 12.30 y de 14 a 17 horas, excepto los días festivos.
